greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = P(A055396(n), A001511(1+n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A055396(n) = if(n==1, 0, primepi(factor(n)[1, 1])); \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 23 2015
from sympy import primepi, isprime, primefactors
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
def a055396(n): return 0 if n==1 else a049084(min(primefactors(n)))
def a(n): return T(a055396(n), a001511(n + 1)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 07 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 07 2017
